landmarks.name: St. Charles Convention Center (DevUp HQ)
landmarks.address: 1 Convention Center Plaza, St. Charles, MO 63303
landmarks.description: The main venue for DevUp 2025—your starting point for all quests!

quiz.question: Which river is nearest to the St. Charles Convention Center?

landmarks.name: Embassy Suites St. Charles
landmarks.address: 2 Convention Center Plaza, St. Charles, MO 63303
landmarks.description: The connected hotel—perfect for DevUp attendees grabbing coffee between sessions.

quiz.question: Which meal is complimentary for Embassy Suites guests?

landmarks.name: Streets of St. Charles
landmarks.description: A walkable district with restaurants, shops, and a movie theater—just north of the convention center.

quiz.question: Which attraction is NOT located at Streets of St. Charles?

landmarks.name: Ameristar Casino Resort Spa
landmarks.description: Casino, dining, and nightlife situated on the Missouri River—about a mile east of DevUp HQ.

quiz.question: Which amenity can you find at Ameristar St. Charles?

landmarks.name: Katy Trail – Frontier Park Trailhead
landmarks.address: 500 S Riverside Dr, St. Charles, MO 63301
landmarks.description: Eastern trailhead of the 240-mile Katy Trail—ideal for a scenic walk or bike ride along the Missouri River.

quiz.question: The Katy Trail follows which former railroad’s right-of-way?
